Living Art partners with healtcare providers through the Magical Child Augmented Reality Experience
enhancing the circle of care.

art + technology + health

The Magical Child AR Experience

An Augmented Reality App designed for children in hospitals and treatment centers.

The Magical Child art series emphasizes nature, play and discovery.  Each art piece is hand drawn by artist Lindsay Carron designed to alleviate stress associated with hospital stays.

Meet Ki!

Ki is our interactive guide welcoming children into the creative world of Magical Child.

A smiley-faced sun,
captivating globe
playful dolphins,
and enchanting pines.

Ki is our interactive host welcoming children into...

The creative world of Magical Child

Here's how it works:

Brought to life with augmented reality technology, the artwork invites the child to leap into a magical world

Patients can use the App in bed while they rest

Open the app and point the smart device towards the Magical Child artwork

Tap specific animals and watch them come to life in 3D augmented animation

A hidden artistic world comes alive at the patient's fingertips offering a fun and meditative reprieve from stress

The Future of Art Therapy

Nurturing, fun and rewarding experience for child and caregiver alike.

The Living Art Team

Cindy Starry

CEO and Founder

As an Integrative Medicine practitioner for over 20 years, Cindy Starry innovates healthcare through the combination of art and technology.  She facilitates creative and nurturing patient and caregiver experiences that reach beyond the hospital walls.

Lindsay Carron

Artist

Lindsay travels around the world to bring magical experiences to life with her drawings that remind us all of the life-giving beauty of our earth.
